0101011010111101 0110110000000010 0 -> sum: 1100001010111111, cout: 0

1010001000101111 1001011111000111 1 -> sum: 0011100111110111, cout: 1
0110000000001011 1010001111100011 1 -> sum: 0000001111101111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
